Song.title: Jesus Keep Me Near the Cross
Song.copyright: Words and music by Matt Redman. (c) 1999 Thankyou Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G] You led me to the cross [D/F#] And I saw Your f[Em]ace of mercy In that [C] place of love [G] You opened up my eyes [D/F#] To believe Your s[Em]weet salvation Where I'd [C] been so blind [A7/C#] Now that I'm l[C]iving in Your all [G] forgiving love [D] [A7/C#] My every road [C] leads to[D/F#] the cross [G]
Chorus: [G] Jesus [D/F#] keep me near the cross [Em Em/D] [A7/C#] I won't forget [C] the love You've shown [G] Saviour [D/F#] teach me of the cross [Em Em/D] [A7/C#] I won't forget the love [C] I won't forget the love You've sh[G]own [Gsus G]
Verse 2: [G] And there's an empty tomb [D/F#] That tells me of Your r[Em]esurrection And my [C] life in You [G] The stone lies rolled away [D/F#] Nothing but those f[Em]olded grave clothes Where Your [C] body lay [A7/C#] Now that I'm l[C]iving as a ri[G]sen child of God [D] [A7/C#] My every road [C] leads to[D/F#] the cross [G]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 you led me to the cross and i saw your face of mercy in that place of love you opened up my eyes to believe your sweet salvation where id been so blind now that im living in your all forgiving love my every road leads to the cross chorus jesus keep me near the cross i wont forget the love youve shown saviour teach me of the cross i wont forget the love i wont forget the love youve shown verse 2 and theres an empty tomb that tells me of your resurrection and my life in you the stone lies rolled away nothing but those folded grave clothes where your body lay now that im living as a risen child of god my every road leads to the cross
